title: Remove Nidalee's Heal
body: Mobility and Poke on that level should not come with Sustain or with any amount of Utility for her allies. She already brings so much damage and potential scouting. Why does she also need to be able to heal better than most healers?

Nid doesn't have any crowd control, that's the big difference between her and Lee.

And she has one AOE, which is melee range.  That's a pretty serious limitation for a mage -- a class that includes {{champion:101}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:69}} etc.

What are you talking about?  Nid's spear outranges turrets.  She doesn't even have to aim, just keep chucking blindly and get lucky once or twice.  She has massive waveclear and can splitpush like crazy.  Plus, her heal gives her attack speed which just chews turrets.  She's a seige monster.

Did she hit anyone not packing 80+ MR?  Oops, guess they're out of the fight for about 10-20 seconds depending while they back.

He actually has pretty good waveclear thanks to his energy regen efficiency and his passive, and he can still splitpush fairly well, even after his attack speed nerf.  Admittedly, he isn't a true generalist champ, but he has so much extra stuff packed into his kit that compared to most other assassins, he's a generalist.

Nidalee is like an abominated mix of Xerath, Yorick and Lee Sin.

She has poke, range, sustain and mobility, and this becomes especially true once she buys any item to keep her mana regen high enough to keep spamming. 

And no, I don't think slightly nerfing her attack speed will fix it.

> And no, I don't think slightly nerfing her attack speed will fix it.

Well, it worked well on Zed... no, wait, my mistake, it did not.
I actually have witnessed the attack speed nerf fucking over a Zed a few times now. Mainly involving his passive.
Yeye

You're seriously comparing one long range skill that stops at the first minion and can damage one target max with THREE long range skills, two of which can hit multiple targets and the third is a hard CC?

Nid's poke is really weak compared to champions that are actually good at poke.

Self replied to add: and also, like all transform champions, Nid lacks a true fight-changing ult.  Xerath's is... well, look at that, it's yet another super long range nuke!  It's almost like he was built to be great at that and Nid wasn't.

She doesn't lose power when her ult is down, because it's never down -- but she also doesn't gain power when her ult is up.  Nid with ult = most other champions WITHOUT ult.

She's a typical generalist champion of this season along with all the others.

Definition of a LoL generalist: Jack of all trades, master of them all. What's a trade-off again?

Very true. However, those abilities are essentially nidalees ultimate. I wouldnt say that shes ahead of the game. Changing form means changing her abilities so she will essentially only have 3 abilities available at a time until she transforms. Most other champions don't exactly transform like she does so they will have 4 abilities available to them.

The point was that the cost of the heal is still relatively high meaning that she'd drain her pool particularly faster than other champions if shes constantly heeling herself.

Considering we have an Idiot playing Nidalee who waste all her mana on heals, she'll still have half of her spells. A Garen Ult on a 5 second cooldown, a Kassadin Riftwalk with no mana cost and a decent wave clear ability with her swipe. 

But the issue to me is that Nidalee is a close-range assassin with a lack cc, which she makes up for using her Powerful skills and Traps combine with her mobility. The heal although somewhat expensive has no place in her kit, sustain is something that Assassin's shouldn't possess innately. Its the only skill she posses that doesn't synch with her other abilities, so if anything it should be replaced with something that does.
Don't forget the heal also gives 60% attack speed.......

Most of her human form kit is just random skills.  Poke + nuke, vision + health shred, heal + attack speed buff.  What is that supposed to encourage her to do?  Hide in bushes and poke, like usual.  She needs a full rework or she'll be just as annoying as usual whenever she gets buffs.  Her human form kit was horribly designed.

Yes, exactly -- because she can't do jack in a teamfight.  She's kind of like {{champion:17}} that way, which maybe explains some of the hate.

Force fights where she can't run away without giving up an objective or leaving her team to die, and she won't be a problem.  Wander around aimlessly until someone gets picked off, and she'll be a BIG problem.  The counters to Nid are vision, team coordination and shotcalling -- no wonder she's a pubstomper.

I didn't say nid was balanced. Just because Meteos chose NId over Lee it doesn't make her a better jungler. Basing everything off of pros actions will never result in anything good. Pros are pros, and thus can make decisions based off of their preferences. However, with all things considered Lee offers more in the long run than nidalee does. Whereas Nidalee without a doubt beats Lee in poke, she would have to build a lot of AP, reducing her capabilities as a bruiser with teamfight capabilities. If she builds AD or just bruiser, she reduces poke but increases teamfight capability. Lee is someone who, while building bruiser, can instagib a squishy, offer strong CC in teamfights, peel for the adc, AND splitpush. Also just fyi Nidalee COUNTERS J4. He couldn't beat her in a 1v1 at any stage in the game unless he got fed. He can't keep her in the wall with his ult. She can dodge his EQ with her leap. She just beats him in every stage. You can't really compare the two m8.

Her biggest problem is that people don't know how to dodge. She is similar to Akali with her rework but if she doesn't land her skill or if traps are avoided she cannot dash to you. Her sustain isn't really a huge thing since it doesn't heal for much unless you build her pure AP. Now a days she is built as a bruiser and there are a lot of bruisers with crazier sustain and more damage that don't need to change forms to be able to use it.
I see full AP nidalee 10 times more than Bruiser
